paragraphs: I expect you to hold the garrison at all costs. You can and should leverage the captives as hostages if it comes to that. Should the unthinkable occur, instruct your men to fall back across the bridge to the crypts. I have given Battlemage Papus instructions on how to summon the "gifts" left buried in the pass so long ago. The garrison will not fall, our lord will see to that.

— Septima Tharn
Magus-General, Imperial Seventh Legion
